description: React component for managing departments in an admin interface, including listing, creating, and deleting departments, with API integration and UI elements.

methods.name: DepartmentsTable
methods.description: Main React component for managing departments, including UI and data fetching.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates a new department and refreshes the department list.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specified department and refreshes the department list.
